level.text: The Agency may operate any of the on-line games described in Chapter 9 of this title.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง4 of the Law to Legalize Lotteries, Daily Numbers Games, and Bingo and Raffles for Charitable Purposes in the District &Columbia, D.C. Law 3-172. D.C. Official Code ยง3-1301 et seq.
